Title: Tobacco Board pegs crop size at 130 million kg
Content: The Tobacco Board has pegged the crop size for Flue Cured Virginia (FCV) tobacco for Andhra Pradesh for the year 2016-17 at 130 million kg, 10 million kg more than that of last year.The board has take
